QuestData.Title: The Ashweb Matriarch
QuestData.Description: My dear Kun spotted more spiders pouring out of the Guo-Lai Halls this morning, and when he went to investigate, he uncovered another spider matriarch inside.$B$BI need you to kill it.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Anji Autumnlight at the Ruins of Guo-Lai in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
